tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.reader

Class XMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.reader.XMLReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Document>, java.util.Iterator<Document>, InputReader

    public class XMLReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputReader
    XML input reader to read GermEval sentiment XML format.
